subject: Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Philippe Gilbert of Belgium won the 122-mile ninth stage of the Vuelta a España, just in front of Joaquim Rodríguez of Spain.
snippet: Philippe Gilbert of Belgium won the 122-mile ninth stage of the Vuelta a España, just in front of Joaquim Rodríguez of Spain.
